article.headline: Buffalo 74, Niagara 62
article.story: AMHERST, N.Y. (AP) -- Yassin Idbihi scored 20 points and grabbed 12 rebounds as Buffalo defeated Niagara 74-62 Saturday. Greg Gamble tied a career high with 15 points and 4 rebounds, while Parnell Smith had 12 points with 9 boards. Andy Robinson scored 14 points. Buffalo (6-2) capitalized on an 11-2 run to open the second half. The Bulls held a 37-31 advantage in rebounds over Niagara while shooting 49 percent from the floor for the game and 15 of 29 from the foul line. Niagara (1-4) jumped out by connecting on 8 of its first 12 shots, including five consecutive 3-pointers. Clif Brown led the Purple Eagles with 17 points and 9 rebounds, while Tyrone Lewis had 13 points and Rydell Brooks had 12. But several Purple Eagles ran into foul trouble, including J.R. Duffey, who was held to just 8 points and collected his third foul with 7:50 left in the first half and Niagara leading 21-16. Niagara made just 2 of its next 12 shots after that, shooting 10 of 24 for the first half and went scoreless for nearly five minutes. Meanwhile the Bulls, despite a 13 for 24 half, chiseled into Niagara's lead. Idbihi was 5 of 7 from the floor and Gamble drained a jump shot at the buzzer, giving Buffalo a 31-27 lead at halftime. Niagara was 22-of-55 from the field and 11-for 15 from the foul line, while connecting on 7 of 19 3-point attempts.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
